snippet: The Army general who found his career stalled after a profile of Gen. Stanley A. McChrystal appeared in Rolling Stone magazine, received his third star on Friday.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: The Army general who found his career stalled after a profile of Gen. Stanley A. McChrystal appeared in Rolling Stone magazine, received his third star on Friday.

headline.main: General’s Career Is Stalled No More
